amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to require that complaints from a member of the Armed Forces of harassment or prohibited discrimination be completed within 180 days, and allows for members to seek review or appeal in a U.S. court if they wished to after the 180 days are exhausted.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires that complaints from a member of the Armed Forces of harassment or prohibited discrimination be completed within 180 days, and allows for members to seek review or appeal in a U.S. court if they wished to after the 180 days are exhausted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 209 (Roll no. 314).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Escobar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 209 (Roll no. 314).
